channel.title: quotes on wilspi
channel.description: Recent content in quotes on wilspi

item.title: beautiful quotes 🙌
item.description: ​ Impatience with actions, patience with results. – Naval ​ Your heart needs to break multiple times for it to open up. – Rumi ​ And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music. – Friedrich Nietzsche ​ Somewhere in the process of maturing into adults, most humans misunderstood comfort for happiness. ​ Alice came to a fork in the road.

item.title: words ✍️
item.description: ​ Alone Living alone teaches you the importance of someone’s company ​ Anger memory of pain in the past messenger that shows you that something important to you is being betrayed, squashed, or overlooked. A boundary, a value, a desire. Don’t kill (supress) that messenger (ofcourse don’t react). best remedy is to delay (any reaction) understand the source, when you get irritated, write and explain the feelings, it might help in identifying the source ​
